# ðŸ“˜ Deep Learning from Scratch (Vol. 1)

This project focuses on implementing deep learning algorithms from scratch  
Learning about DL **without using high-level libraries**, based on the book by **Koki Saito**.








**Note:**
* **Chapters 01 & 02 (Python Basics)** were reviewed for prerequisite knowledge but are not included in this repository.
* Images that are not hand drawn are from the book(**Deep Learning from Scratch (Vol. 1)**) or generated by **GeoGebra**.
